name: Planet Hopper (Haydawg, frazer134)
description:
Created By 

Hayden McGeady

Frazer Cowan

Escape the Fleet of enemy ships by going form planet to planet to drain them of fuel

get to the end of the solar system by traversing the planet in order to escape

Watch out though as your ships systems will take damage along the path which will effect how effective they are

three mini games + overworld

overworld click to move to next planet the planet you move to must have a connection to the planet you are currently on

Asteroid 

dodge the oncoming asteroids by moving left or right (A or S) in order to collect the fuel at the end. watch out though because if you are hit your thrusters will be less effective

Scanning

decide where to place your 3 scanning Buoys by clicking on the planets surface which will detect resources you can use for fuel scanner damage will cause the radius of the scanners to decrease

Drilling 

Defend your ship with its weapon system from the planets natives by clicking on the aproaching enemies while you drill their planet for resources you can use for fuel. Damage to the weapon system will slow down your fire rate
